mapper.insert: insert into users (username, password, first_name, last_name, postal_name) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{postal_name})
mapper.select: select id, username, password, first_name, last_name, postal_name from users where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update users set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, first_name = #{first_name}, last_name = #{last_name}, postal_name = #{postal_name} where id = #{id}
